results.name: Triangle read by rows, binomial transform of an infinite lower triangular matrix with (1,2,1,2,1,2,...) in the main diagonal, (1,1,1,...) in the subdiagonal and the rest zeros.
formula: Triangle read by rows, A007318 as an infinite lower triangular matrix * a bidiagonal matrix with (1,2,1,2,1,2,...) in the main diagonal and (1,1,1,...) in the subdiagonal.
